Reviews.Title: This Laptop doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: This Laptop doesn't work. It just freezes after couple of minutes working. According to Amazon policy it couldn't be returned to the seller.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: tejal sanover
Reviews.Content: Pro's - light weight, good battery life, can carry it easily in a bag. Worth for the price.Con's - doesn't have a CD drive,but that's the reason it's light weight, the speakers are not all that great, keyboard isn't with a back light.If you want a light weight laptop then this is a good product if the cons don't matter much to you.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!
Reviews.Author: A. Morales
Reviews.Content: I use this for work several hours a day and it runs great! This is my second Toshiba. I was satisifed with the first one so I thought I should stick to the same brand. I've purchased nothing but big and bulky laptops in the past. I have to lug around my laptop for work all the time. I decided this time to purchase something smaller and lighter. I love how thin the ultrabook is. The screen is a decent size. There's no CD drive in this one, but I just bought an external one. I rarely use it anyway, so that's not an issue for me. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Es una portatil muy delgada, justo como decia la publicidad.Tiene un estilo muy bonito y muy ligera.I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Great little computer
Reviews.Author: Aaron T. Whitehead "blksnak"
Reviews.Content: I replaced a netbook with the ultrabook.  It is thin, light and fast.  It is used primarrily for email, and online games.  It boots quickly and runs everything that I currently desire.

Reviews.Title: It is light and 4-hour working battery.
Reviews.Author: Feng Gao
Reviews.Content: The key buttons are slight smaller than normal computer. User has to pay special attention to click keys. This is a design drawback.

Reviews.Title: Keyboard stopped working within 4 months
Reviews.Author: Joseph Mathew
Reviews.Content: I work in the computer field and very experienced in trouble shooting software problems. Despite very light usage, the computer keyboard failed within 4 four months of the purchase. Among the alpha keys only four or five keys works. I tried to fix the problem by uninstalling the keyboard driver and also  by restoring the system, but nothing helped. I do not recommend this laptop.

Reviews.Title: NOT a business computer!
Reviews.Author: J. Link
Reviews.Content: This is the first Toshiba laptop I've ever purchased that completely disappointed me. I bought this computer for my husband to use for travel presentations. It freezes frequently, charges slowly, and has a very short battery life. The worst design feature, however, is its complete lack of a VGA or DVI port. This means that hooking this laptop up to a projector is a logistical nightmare. A technician, who had managed his computer supply store for 15 years, said that he had never seen a laptop without at least one of these types of ports. I researched laptops pretty thoroughly -- I thought -- but admit I didn't specifically look to see whether it had a DVI or VGA port since laptops do typically have at least one of them. Now we're stuck with this lemon of a computer and will have to buy another computer. I can't recommend this to anyone since it freezes up for frequently and shuts down some programs (Outlook, for example). Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: iloveosoul
Reviews.Content: The Toshiba arrived quickly and died quickly. I turned it on and began charging the battery. When I went to use it it completely froze and would not shut down. It made an incredibly annoying high pitched buzzing sound too. I followed all the shut down options, checked the internet on my desktop for solution, but I could not get it to stop buzzing or unfreeze. I ended up putting it in a room on the other side of the house until the battery died. Thankfully Amazon took it back and gave me a full refund.
